about_the_game:
Space Slaves is a tactical space fighting games where an AI apocalypse destroys most of the human race, and the humans that survived are used by the AI as slaves to generate electricity by being placed in pleasure machines. Their emotions and pleasure are harvested by the AI to power their ships. They are part of a huge galactic fleet of ships, moving through the galaxy as the AI is trying to expand it's reach.

The player controls a rebel ship. A few of the enslaved humans managed to free themselves and took over a ship and they are now forming a rebellion against the AI. The goal is to stay alive inside the huge galactic fleet of enemy ships long enough until your engineers can shut down the AI!

Your weapons, shields and engines share one energy source, which is powered by the pleasure energy. Since you are no longer slaves, you need to generate the energy yourself by encountering in sexual acts non-stop!

During your mission, you can also save other slaves from the AI controlled ships - a brief image of the slave will be shown, which can be later accessed in the gallery.



- Unique space combat with responsive controls.
- Physics based space ship movement.
- Lots of weapons and upgrade options to choose from.
- A fun story mode where the player fights to save humanity from annihilation.



Gameplay is a top down 2D real time tactical space shooter with visual novel elements. You command a spaceship with multiple weapons and defense mechanisms. As you upgrade your ship you can increase the energy capacity and the amount of systems you can operate at maximum.

The demo of the game contains only a small subset of systems, weapons, upgrades and it is limited to one short mission. Full game contains multiple missions linked together through story presented in a visual novel style.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains images and story elements of sexual content and nudity in the context of slavery. The game also contains violence with some amounts of blood and combat wounds, and non-consensual sexual stimulation.

name: Space Slaves

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

dejus.descriptors:
Violência Extrema
Conteúdo sexual
Linguagem imprópria

Their emotions and pleasure are harvested by the AI to power their ships.
